name: Kunj Tyagi
bio: Hi! I'm Kunj, currently studying Computer Science And Engineering at AKGEC, Ghaziabad. Passionate about Technology.

top_projects.name: WanderLust
top_projects.description: WanderLust is a fullstack web application designed for users to list and rent spaces, featuring user authentication, listing management, and a clean, responsive interface. Built with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and JavaScript, it allows users to create, manage, and view rental listings, complete with image uploads.

top_projects.name: GrowTrades
top_projects.description: Built a full-featured stock trading platform mimicking Zerodha’s functionality, enabling users to execute buy and sell orders, track their portfolios, and view stock data via a user-friendly interface.

top_projects.name: QuickReach
top_projects.description: A comprehensive backend API for managing contacts, designed to streamline the process of adding, updating, and organizing contact information. Built with Node.js and Express.js, this backend offers secure contact storage, along with features for efficient data retrieval and management, making it ideal for CRM and personal contact applications.

top_projects.name: CommitVault
top_projects.description: 🚀 CommitVault is a GitHub-inspired platform that allows users to manage repositories, track code changes, and collaborate on projects seamlessly.

top_projects.name: Weather-App
top_projects.description: This project is a comprehensive weather application built with React, showcasing the implementation of key React concepts. The app provides real-time weather updates for various locations while demonstrating 🌟 state management, 🔄 component lifecycle, ⚓ hooks, and 🧩 conditional rendering.

top_projects.name: Registration
top_projects.description: Building a scalable and secure backend system for a registration form involves incorporating best practices for architecture, authentication, data validation, error handling, and deployment. Below is a complete plan and implementation guide for creating a scalable and secure backend using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

top_projects.name: ComiCartel
top_projects.description: Comic Management App Backend is a powerful RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js that provides core functionalities for managing a comic collection, including pagination, searching, and sorting. This backend is ideal for applications where users can explore extensive comic collections and filter them based on various criteria.

top_projects.name: RegistrationForm
top_projects.description: A registration platform built with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB Atlas for the MLCoE Society at AKGEC to streamline recruitment for 2nd-year students. This platform collects and stores applicant information securely in the database, allowing administrators to manage applicants effectively.

readme_content:
# Hi there, I'm Kunj Tyagi 👋 Welcome to my GitHub profile! ![Profile Views](https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=Kunj-Tyagi&color=blueviolet) ## 🚀 About Me - 🌱 I’m currently learning new technologies and improving my coding skills. - 👯 I’m looking to collaborate on exciting projects. - 💬 Ask me about anything related to software development. - ⚡ Fun fact: I love solving puzzles and coding challenges. ## 🛠 My Skills ### Programming Languages ![JavaScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/JavaScript-F7DF1E?style=for-the-badge&logo=javascript&logoColor=black) ![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-3178C6?style=for-the-badge&logo=typescript&logoColor=white) ![C++](https://img.shields.io/badge/C++-00599C?style=for-the-badge&logo=c%2B%2B&logoColor=white) ![C](https://img.shields.io/badge/C-A8B9CC?style=for-the-badge&logo=c&logoColor=white) ![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-3776AB?style=for-the-badge&logo=python&logoColor=white) ![HTML](https://img.shields.io/badge/HTML-E34F26?style=for-the-badge&logo=html5&logoColor=white) ![CSS](https://img.shields.io/badge/CSS-1572B6?style=for-the-badge&logo=css3&logoColor=white) ### Frameworks ![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-339933?style=for-the-badge&logo=nodedotjs&logoColor=white) ![React.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/React.js-61DAFB?style=for-the-badge&logo=react&logoColor=black) ![Express.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Express.js-000000?style=for-the-badge&logo=express&logoColor=white) ![Material-UI](https://img.shields.io/badge/Material--UI-0081CB?style=for-the-badge&logo=material-ui&logoColor=white) ![Bootstrap](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bootstrap-7952B3?style=for-the-badge&logo=bootstrap&logoColor=white) ### Tools ![VS Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/VS%20Code-0078D4?style=for-the-badge&logo=visual-studio-code&logoColor=white) ![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-181717?style=for-the-badge&logo=github&logoColor=white) ![Git](https://img.shields.io/badge/Git-F05032?style=for-the-badge&logo=git&logoColor=white) ![Postman](https://img.shields.io/badge/Postman-FD602F?style=for-the-badge&logo=postman&logoColor=white) ![Render](https://img.shields.io/badge/Render-46E3B7?style=for-the-badge&logo=render&logoColor=white) ![AWS](https://img.shields.io/badge/AWS-232F3E?style=for-the-badge&logo=amazon-aws&logoColor=white) ## ## 🏆 GitHub Trophies

Thanks for visiting my profile!

profile_summary: As a Computer Science and Engineering student at AKGEC, Ghaziabad, I'm passionate about technology and proficient in JavaScript and HTML, with a strong foundation in programming languages and frameworks. With 16 public repositories and a growing network of 4 followers, I'm excited to collaborate on exciting projects and continue learning new technologies to improve my coding skills.
